hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying, "If the son of Adam had money equal to a valley, then he will wish for another similar to it, for nothing can satisfy the eye of Adam's son except dust. And Allah forgives him who repents to Him." Ibn `Abbas said: I do not know whether this saying was quoted from the Qur'an or not. `Ata' said, "I heard Ibn AzZubair saying this narration while he was on the pulpit

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُتَّقَى مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَالِ
chapter.eng-name: The Fitnah of wealth should be warded off
